Package org.opensourcephysics.display2d

Class BinaryLattice

java.lang.Object
org.opensourcephysics.display.MeasuredImage
org.opensourcephysics.display2d.BinaryLattice
All Implemented Interfaces:
Drawable, Measurable, ByteLattice
public class BinaryLattice extends MeasuredImage implements ByteLattice
A BinaryLattice is an array where each array element has a value of 0 or 1. The lattice is drawn as an array of rectangles to distinguish between the two possible values.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Wolfgang Christian
